runs.comm: Nehra starts with a length delivery, which Dilshan hits across the line and takes a single to wide of mid-on
half-volley on leg stump, and Jaya plays a little pick-up shot, clearing the leg-side ring. The outfield is quick enough to carry this chip shot through
wide outside off, he slashes at it but can't reach it
hint of swing, Jayasuriya defends around the off stump and the ball flies off the bat, towards cover-point
thick edge, looks to roll his wrists on a cut shot to a delivery short and wide, but the edge carries it wide of slip and fine of squarish third man
fuller and straighter this time, pushed to mid-off
stays just back of a length, Jaya looks to force it through covers but doesn't have enough room
extra bounce for Ishant, 137ks, just outside off, slightly short of good length, Dilshan goes for the big shot but the ball holds its line and beats him, and it carries chest high to Dhoni

the leg stump has gone for an evening stroll. Ishant follows that corker up with a full and straight delivery, Dilshan looks to make room and play beside the line, the slightest of swings beats him and sends the leg stump cartwheeling. Ishant is all charged up
and looks like that innings hasn;t been interrupted at all. Leans forwar
stays back and nudges it to wide of backward point for a single
tries the bounces, misses the line by feet and gives away a wide down the leg side
another sharp delivery, 143ks, Jaya sees the width and goes for his upper-cut, but is beaten by the pace and the bounce, throat high for Dhoni this time
this would have gone rib-high to second slip, but there is only one slip in place. Another sharp delivery, starts around off, moves away, Jaya pokes at it and gets a thick edge
starts with a good length, and just outside off, Sanga lets this one go through to the keeper
Sanga steps put and makes room, Tyagi throws this one wide of off, slightly too wide
full and straight this time, Sanga looks to drive, gets the toe end of the bat towards cover
Sanga is beaten this time, looks to charge him again, this time Tyagi keeps it simple, back of a length, just outside off, and Sanga ends up playing under the bounce
amazing flat six, Sanga stands his ground this time, waits for the short ball, opens the face, brings the bottom hand in and gets it over point. And it carries all the way
back to his elegant driving now, is expecting a fuller delivery, gets it, leans into the drive and gets it between mid-off and extra cover
better delivery, in-between length, no room, and gets the respect from Sanga who pats it back to the bowler
Jaya tees of big time, and connects just the air, Ishant has made him play and miss

Raina saves three this time, that's three more than India saved the other night. It is a good extra-cover drive from Jaya, flying across the outfield, but Raina dives full length and gets a hand to it
another smart shot from Sanga, comes onto the front foot, instead of covers he goes square this time, opening the face and going over point
he can do now wrong it seems, gets an inside edge this time, is late on the drive, but the edge misses both the stumps and the keeper, and flies across to fine-leg boundary
shot of the evening so far, stands tall, just meets a back-of-a-length delivery on the up, just a push, finds the extra-cover gap and it speeds across
short delivery, and it moves away from Sanga, too far away
short delivery again but better directed, into the ribs, and Sanga defends it
hint of swing here, starts off, moves away a touch, Jaya pushes it towards cover
that's the signature short-arm pick-up shot, prominent bottom hand, length delivery it is and is sent sailing over mid-on
another Jaya special, length ball again, gives his space outside off, and he goes up and over cover
they have put a deep point there, and it matters little to Jaya if you bowl short and wide to him; gets under it and clears the fielder easily, and that's 600 career runs for him
when it rains it pours, Jaya is looking for the flick over square leg, gets an inside edge, but even that goes right enough of Dhoni to go four four
goes for the pull, but this one is to full, no damage done, though
a rare lazy shot, looks to loft it over leg side, the ball hurries onto him, but falls one bounce to midwicket
dances down the track and drives, long on is deep
that's fired in fast, flat and wide down the leg side
gets away this time, fired into the pads again, and hits the pad on the way
another delivery down the leg side, Jayasuriya misses out on the sweep
the plan doesn't seem to be working, this is fired in again, down the leg side, Dhoni gets a touch on it but it is fast enough to go for four wides
this time Sanga yorks himself, and we see a rare dot ball

the more things change the more they remain same. Jadeja comes in and one of his first touches on the ball is a dropped catch. At deep midwicket, as Sanga mis-hits the lofted shot. Jadeja gets under it and ends up parrying it to the boundary
Raina  comes into the attack, and fires another wide down the leg side
another wide down the leg side, something clearly wrong here with either the plan or the execution thereof
worked away off the pads, and Sanga and Jaya convert this into two. Is Jaya actually 40? He could be the only under-age cricket from the subcontinent
floated around the leg-stump line, played back to the bowler
dances down the track and drives it down to long-on
stays back and pushes it to long-off
ninth wide of the innings, fired down the leg side again
nudges this into the on side and goes for a single
this could have been another wide but Jaya comes across and works it around the corner for one
would have been another wide, but Jaya opts to sweep, misses and gets a leg-bye
short, outside off, cut away to the right of sweeper-cover for two
lovely, clean, straight loft, stays in the crease, gets the front leg aside, gets under the ball and swings his arms through
goes inside-out and drives it through covers for one

comes right in front of stumps and sweeps and misses a full delivery, always dangerous that shot as the ball is too full and has hit him on the half volley, right in front of the stumps. Relief for India
and works his first ball in international cricket around the corner for a single
starts off with a full delivery outside off, and is driven down the ground
full delivery on the pads, worked away for one
looks to charge down, Jadeja fires it in, and he drives it down the ground again
another full delivery on the pads, and worked away towards fine leg again
misses out on a fulltoss, doesn't get the timing right and plays it straight to extra cover
length ball, on off, bunts it into the covers and comes through for one
almost a stunner pulled off by Raina. Length ball, driven high and to the left of Raina at cover, who dives high and gets his left hand to it. Two more runs saved by him
yorker length, just a single down to long-on
length ball, on the pads, played down the ground for one
Jayasinghe frees his arms here, gets under a length ball and crashes it over extra cover. No getting left hand to it this time
cut away to the left of the sweeper-cover, there isn't much room on offer but he finds enough power
this time he gets the room, looks to go up and over but misses
pushed down the ground for an easy single
flat on off, and cut away to point for one
worked away to fine leg and he hares back for the second
what a way to get to third consecutive fifty in T20s. Wallops his Kings XI Punjab team-mate, dances down the track and lofts him over midwicket. Another clean shot
shows him the reverse-sweep but doesn't go for it, as a result he gets a nice little fulltoss outside leg, and gets enough bat on it to take it for four to fine leg

and the birthday boy strikes, this time looks to go over midwicket again but gets too much under it and gets more height than distance. Also he is a touch late into the shot, hitting it straighter towards long-on
good shot, gooood shot, and it's the first ball MJ has faced, takes a short and wide delivery and late-cuts it beautifully
full ball, on the pads, and worked away to midwicket for single
drives powerfully, but straight to extra cover
fulltoss, and mis-hits it this time, but gets it wide enough of long-off to come back for two
hit powerfully again, but straight back to the bowler
lovely shot, he steps down a touch, gets to the pitch of it, and goes inside-out, wide of long-off, all along the ground
and starts with a wide down the leg side, hawww
back of a length, on off stump, played back to the bowler
back of a length outside off, runs it down to third man
almost lbw here, he stands in the crease and swings across the line and misses, just shaping down the leg side
this is the same shot but played much more classily, clears the front leg, makes clean contact, and picks this length ball over midwicket boundary
slower ball gets Mahela here, who looks for another six and ends up skying it to long-off where Tyagi takes a safe catch. Smartly bowled, and gives India a chance to pull SL back
misses out on a leg-side offering, this is short and on the pads, but he is late into the shot
lovely clean strike, gets a length ball, gets under it, clean swing of the marks, and long-off is no less a spectator than me
fired in at the pads, and he misses
misses a hit on the leg-side delivery, but gets a leg-bye
back of a length, flat, and hit back to the bowler
makes room this time, and takes a single to sweeper cover
worked away towards midwicket, Yuvraj can't make a clean sliding save and they get two
short ball, pulls, but it comes onto him too slow, and he gets just a single to long-on
Jayasinghe looks for the big shot over leg side, but again Yuvraj gives him no pace to work with and all he gets is a single
11th wide by India, down the leg side again

Yuvraj gets two on birthday, and again slowing down the pace helps him, Kapugedera looks for the big slog over midwicket, and has no pace to work with, and ends up holing out to deep midwicket. India inching back and trying to keep SL to a manageable total
flat delivery, works it into the off side for one
and has Jadeja missed out on a run-out? Weeraratne paddles, straight to short fine, looks for a single, is sent back, but Jadeja doesn't even go for it. There is definitely a chance here
pinches in a single to midwicket this time
flicked away uppishly off the pads for one
dropped, that's the second one down tonight, another big heave goes wrong, Nehra has ages to judge this one but doesn't come in and ends up diving forward and grassing it
that's injury to insult, or the other way rather, as he absolutely thwacks it straight down the ground for four

and then there were three, dropped by Gautam Gambhir this time, regulation catch again at deep square leg, he comes in all right, but as he goes down while taking the catch, the jerk pushes it out of his hands. The batsman is walking off, but Gambhir calls him back right away
short, into the body, and pulled away for a single
swiped away from in front of stumps towards long-on
a feline innings come to an end - almost nine lives he had - plays a pick-up shot from the leg-stump line, and this time Jadeja holds onto it. Yuvraj is personally having a nice 28th birthday
and Weeraratne is run out,  big mix-up as Mathews looks to get off the mark, a slight yes-no means Sehwag's throw beats Weeraratne to striker's end and third umpire is not required
and drives it down the ground to get off the mark
worked away off the pads and he gets off the mark now - has blood on his hands, though
looks to work around the corner but can;t beat short fine leg
goes aerial, mis-hits, but has gone damn straight and no one can catch that
gets a leg-bye to a delivery fired down his pads
he works it off his pads and gets a single to square leg
goes for the reverse sweep and misses but gets a leg-bye

another chance goes down, top edge, goes towards mid-on, Jadeja can't make it that far. Sunny Gavaskar on air: "The way they are going about it, despite the cold weather I doubt if they will be able to catch the cold."
driven down the ground, gets a single
yorker, incredibly timed, it is flying across to the wide long-on boundary, Kohli does well to get down and keep them down to two
take the Bravo flick, take out a touch of arrogance, and you have this shot, just a turn of wrist at the right time, and the timing carries it over deep square leg. Incredible shot
back of a length, pushed down to long-on for a single
quick delivery, Kulasekara looks to push it for one, and ends up playing inside the line
this time he connects and gets a single down to long-on

it's spreading like the wine flu, Karthik drops one this time. It's a pick-up shot off the pads, Dinesh Karthik moves to his right and gets to it, gets low and gets both hands to it but cannot hold onto it. India you beauty
digs it in short, into the ribs, he gets a single to midwicket
makes room, Nehra sees him and goes across him, and Mathews gets just a single to long-off
goes for the bouncer, and it goes over Kula's head
another short ball, he swings and gets a top edge that lobs over Nehra for a single
fulltoss with mid-on up, he gets enough to it to clear the fielder and gets important runs in the last over
slower ball, Mathews sees it and goes inside out, Sehwag dives at extra cover and gets a hand to it and saves two, 200 up

Mathews has finished this in style, it is short, not too high, right in the slot, and Mathews pulls and gets enough power into it. He has made up for the Weeraratne run-out through these last two overs, has Mathews
